DeathSteel::

He decides to try another aproach. He did underestimate  his 
apponent. He ran towards Kaiser.  He brought his battle blade up as 
if he was going bring the blade down on kaiser's head. Instead, he 
swung it around and brought it around to swing upwards to hit Kaiser 
in the belly or chest.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        He rolls under DeathSteel's flip and comes up to his feet 
facing his 
> opponent.  "Come now DeathSteel, you'll have to do better than 
that."  He 
> thinks for a moment.  "You may have two more passes before I begin 
my attack. 
>  I recommend that you don't underestimate me again."  He adopts 
another 
> defensive stance and lowers his center of gravity for the next 
approach."
